General.Name: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret AS
General.Description: Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. engages in the textile, real estate, and tourism businesses in Turkey. The company engages in the production of textiles, fabrics, cloths, dyeing, finishing, and sizing operations or outsourcing; and semi-finished products and raw materials, including cotton weaving and clothing made of polyester, gin, pressed sawgin, and yarn. It is also involved in the purchase, lease, and construction of real estate properties; and tourism activities. Bilici Yatirim Sanayi ve Ticaret A.S. was founded in 1950 and is based in Adana, Turkey.
General.Address: Haci Sabanci Organized Industrial Zone, Adana, Turkey, 01350

2.Name: Mr. Mehmet Fatih Bilici
2.Title: Pres of Tourism & Investments and Exec. Director
